title.default: ON SALE for Pure Writer 5th Anniversary + School season
title.zh: 纯纯写作五周年 + 开学季特惠活动

message.default:
On July 4, 2017, Pure Writer launched its first version on Google Play, starting a long "five-year project". During these five years, we submitted a total of 8,000 updates, ranging from v1.0.0 to v20.5.5, in the latest version, we have implemented important functions such as "Cloud Sync", which is gratifying. For five full years, it's been a really crazy process and a rare milestone.

Therefore, during 2022.9.1 ~ 2022.9.4, Pure Writer Pro (lifetime), originally priced at $21.99, is discounted to $14.99.
message.zh:
2017 年 7 月 4 日，纯纯写作上架了第一个版本，从此开启了漫长的「五年工程」，在这五年里，我们共提交了 8000 多次更新，版本号从 v1.0.0 到如今的 v20.6.6，在最新版中，我们实现了「云同步」等重要功能，可喜可贺，这真是一个非常难得的里程碑。

同时，值此开学季，在 2022.9.1 ~ 2022.9.4 期间，纯纯写作 Pro（永久会员）现提供大幅降价优惠！

在纯纯写作 Pro 页面底部可查看最新优惠售价。
